name: Frogg Music
short_description: FroggMusic is an open-source replacement for the client software that runs on the Dell Receiver/Rio Receiver/SONIC blue Rio Receiver. FroggMusic supports Ogg Vorbis, Ogg Flac, MP3, and SHOUTcast playback and can display a clock.
